refnamediv.refpurpose: Initialise the current branch for use with StGIT

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: Initialise the current git branch to be used as an StGIT stack. The branch (and the git repository it is in) must already exist and contain at least one commit.

refsect1.title: StGit
refsect1.simpara: Part of the StGit suite - see stg1
